attributes.action: Remove TV Licensing charges, like other developed Country.
attributes.additional_details: With Cost of living going up every day, TV licensing charge should be completely removed. Information and Media is a right.
attributes.background: Ask government to completely remove TV licensing charges. Make free for everyone like every other country in the world.

rejection.details:
We understand you want the TV licence fee to be abolished, however it's not clear how you want the BBC to be funded instead.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

'Revoke the TV licence at the end of 2027': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606528

'Fund the BBC from general taxation rather than a licence fee': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606617
